meanings.sent1: She is very outgoing and always greets everyone with a smile.
meanings.sent2: The outgoing girl made friends easily at the party.
meanings.sent3: His outgoing nature made the whole group feel comfortable around him.

meanings.sent5: Being outgoing means being warm and welcoming to others.

meanings.definition: Expressing or revealing thoughts or feelings openly
meanings.sent1: Her outgoing nature allowed her to share her feelings without hesitation.
meanings.sent2: The outgoing student was not afraid to speak up in class discussions.
meanings.sent3: His outgoing behavior made it easy for others to understand his emotions.
meanings.sent4: The outgoing artist poured his heart into his expressive paintings.
meanings.sent5: Being outgoing means being unafraid to show who you truly are.
